title: of State at the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) (No.2) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) (No.2) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department justice home affair migration) (no.2) order

title: of State at the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) (No.2) Order
of State at the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration) (No.2) Order
heading: 2. Robert Lahiff, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Robert Lahiff, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
office of the Department of Justice, Home Affairs and Migration, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Colm Brophy, Minister of State at the Department of 
Justice, Home Affairs and Migration, with effect from 25 February 2025. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [402] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
